predictions.sentence: *BitMine chair Tom Lee said that Ether going to $12,000 wouldn’t be a “blow off top,” it will just be price discovery at a new level.*
predictions.author: Numerous_Ruin_4947

predictions.sentence: *BitMine chair Tom Lee and BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes are holding strong on their prediction that Ether will hit $10,000 this year, despite the recent crypto crash, and there being less than three months left on the clock.*
predictions.author: Numerous_Ruin_4947
